feed.title: AO3 - Clark Kent/Bruce Wayne (Filtered)
feed.subtitle: Latest works for Clark Kent/Bruce Wayne on Archive of Our Own [English, No ABO]

entry.title: Tentacles of Love
entry.summary:
Author: LadyArkin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,397Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 37

Summary: He wasn’t even offering much more than, “I need a favor, buddy.”Batman’s marriage proposal was sudden and…strategic.Once they’ve spent some time together, Batman talks Superman into marrying for a mission. A mission that Bruce declares to be entirely selfish which he needs for business purposes. This mission isn’t supposed to be impactful to either of their personal lives.It starts when Bruce releases pictures of Batman proposing to Superman. He didn’t need more than a distraction and if it hadn’t been for an intervention from their family and friends, it wouldn’t have been. The more involved their blended family gets into their relationship, the more that they are supported in their relationship.

entry.title: Picture You
entry.summary:
Author: harpsichordsandthelit

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,010Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 354

Summary: Clark Kent just moved into a new apartment. The building is nice. His neighbors are welcoming. He heard some good things about the guy who lived here before him.And then he received a postcard.  Hey, I used to live in your apartment. I’m drunk in Gotham, and it’s the only address I can think of. Happy Holidays. B. W.  Inspired by this Tumblr post

entry.title: And They Were Just Best Friends
entry.summary:
Author: kitfornow

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,559Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 112

Summary: “Uh—before we begin,” Clark announces, “a bit of personal business. I am officially engaged!”“What!?” Barry asks excitedly.“Wow!” Diana exclaims. “Most congratulations!” Hal and Oliver clap and whoop, and Clark smiles in appreciation.“Ohmygosh,” Barry continues, “I was just saying the other day that you two would figure it out! Hal, you owe me twenty—”“—To Lois Lane," Bruce interrupts, still staring out the window.Bruce’s interruption has the entire table falling silent, faces genuinely falling, mouths snapping closed. Clark doesn’t really understand why anyone would need the clarification.-A 5+1(+1) Things crack fic that I couldn't stop thinking about.

entry.title: The Road Not Taken
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,062Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 30

Summary: "And this- this was what he remembered clearest. The boy looking at him with such intensity it may as well have been a glare. The redness scored about his eyes and cheeks, the almost angry press of his lips into a harsh straight line - defiant. Each and every detail of his face ingrained into Clark so deep it went beyond mere synapses and the cramped attic space of his brain. It was etched into his bones, carved into the core of him with the certainty of a cleaving blade.The boy’s face from all those years ago fit perfectly into Bruce Wayne’s now."-Whilst attending a gala, Daily Planet reporter Clark Kent remembers the day that a car broke down near the farm.

entry.title: the abyss gazes also
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,949Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 47

Summary: The gun fires twice. Blood and pearls fill the alleyway. The boy comes to a resolution. Years later in the mountains of Nepal, while honing his skills beneath the exacting gaze of Ra’s al Ghul, the boy comes to a crossroads.He makes his choice.The Batman never comes to be. The more things change, the more they stay the same.

entry.title: Family of the Year...Because No One Else Entered the Contest
entry.summary:
Author: Eboni_A

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 91,684Chapters: 16/18Kudos: 392

Summary: Clark Kent and Bruce Wayne are officially married and the adoptive parents of five very active teenagers: Conner, 16, new to families and basic human interaction; Robin, 15, on his way to the Olympic Trials for the US Men’s Gymnastics Team; Jason, 14, a child star about to take on the biggest movie role of his career; Tim, 13, training to be more than a back-up hero; and Damian, 12, ready to step into his father’s work boots and cowl.With their time divided between Gotham and New York City, Clark and Bruce struggle to remain a sane, united front while drowning in the chaotic drama that is teenagers left to their own devices when Jason’s birth mother wants to become a permanent fixture in his life, Robin’s behavior becomes erratic after a celebration turns tragic, Tim fears the feelings he has for Conner, Conner doubts his acceptance into the family, and Talia Al Ghul threatens to visit.For some unions, love just isn’t enough to keep it all together. It’s Clark and Bruce against the world, but can they succeed, when it seems that even their own children are on the opposing side?

entry.title: I hate my own reflection (I see myself in you)
entry.summary:
Author: somagni

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,231Chapters: 10/12Kudos: 70

Summary: When Thwayne plucks Thomas Wayne from his crumbling universe as an act of revenge, three unexpected things happened. One: Kal had refused to let him go, he'd clung to his friend through time and space. Two: He was not in the universe of the Bruce he knew, this Bruce was young, barely a Bat, this Bruce was savable. Three: Alfred, full stop, because everything about Alfred in every universe is unexpected.Prompt: DC Multiverse week Day one - Second chance.
